attributes.action: Recognise military personnel injured during conflicts with an appropriate award.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The US have 'Purple Heart' medals for military injured during conflicts.  This small token helps the injured party understand their efforts were not just a statistic and that they are recognised for the extra difficulties they have to endure for acting on behalf of the government of the day.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to Recognise military personnel injured during conflicts with an appropriate award."
